attributes.action: Cancel recent Large-scale sports events like marathons  due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: There are too many people when holding marathons. Italy spread COVID-19 so quickly at the beginning because someone attended marathon but he did not have symptoms. If UK can cancel the sports events , there would be less risk to spread this disease. At March 15th, there would be a marathon in bath and many residents worry about it .
attributes.background: Cancel marathon and other large-scale sports events or change the time to autumn .
